ListRegions.summary: Queries the regions that are supported by App Streaming.
ListRegions.title: ListRegions

ListNodeInstanceType.summary: Queries the resource types that are available for purchase when you create a delivery group.

schema.description: 资源所属的地域ID。关于支持的地域详情，请参见[使用限制](~~426036~~)。

MaxCapacity.description:
最大并发会话数，即单个资源可同时连接的会话数。如果同时连接的会话数过多，可能导致应用的使用体验下降。取值范围因资源规格不同而不同。各资源规格对应的取值范围分别是：

- appstreaming.general.4c8g：1\~2；
- appstreaming.general.8c16g：1\~4；
- appstreaming.vgpu.8c16g.4g：1\~4；
- appstreaming.vgpu.8c31g.16g：1\~4；
- appstreaming.vgpu.14c93g.12g：1\~6；

ListNodeInstanceType.title: ListNodeInstanceType

enumValueTitles.weekly: 周（每周指定几天重复执行一次定时任务）

enumValueTitles.Mixed: 混合模式，单VPC、双网卡+独立公网IP
enumValueTitles.Shared: 共享模式，单网卡、NAT网管访问公网

enumValueTitles.PDS: 网盘与相册服务（Drive and Photo Service）

PageListAppInstanceGroupUser.summary: Queries the assigned users that are added to a delivery group by page.
PageListAppInstanceGroupUser.title: PageListAppInstanceGroupUser

UpdateAppInstanceGroupImage.summary: Updates the image of a delivery group.
UpdateAppInstanceGroupImage.title: UpdateAppInstanceGroupImage

ModifyAppInstanceGroupAttribute.summary: Modifies the general policies of a delivery group, including the number of concurrent sessions and the retention period of disconnected sessions.

enumValueTitles.PDS: 网盘与相册服务（Drive and Photo Service）

ModifyAppInstanceGroupAttribute.title: ModifyAppInstanceGroupAttribute

schema.title: 按资源售卖的，单个节点允许运行的应用实例数

NodeAmount.description:
购买资源的数量。取值范围：1~100。

> 
- 若为包年包月资源，则该参数不可修改。
- 若为按量付费资源，则当弹性模式（`StrategyType`）为固定数量（`NODE_FIXED`）或自动扩缩容（`NODE_SCALING_BY_USAGE`）时该参数可修改。

ScalingUsageThreshold.title: 触发弹性扩容的会话百分比

StrategyEnableDate.description: 策略生效日期。格式为：yyyy-MM-dd。该日期必须大于或等于当前日期。`StrategyType`（弹性模式）设为`NODE_SCALING_BY_SCHEDULE`（定时扩缩容）时，该字段必填。

StrategyDisableDate.description: 策略失效日期。格式为：yyyy-MM-dd。失效日期与生效日期的间隔必须介于7天到1年之间（含7天和1年）。`StrategyType`（弹性模式）设为`NODE_SCALING_BY_SCHEDULE`（定时扩缩容）时，该字段必填。

WarmUp.description: 是否开启资源预热策略。`StrategyType`（弹性模式）设为`NODE_SCALING_BY_SCHEDULE`（定时扩缩容）时，该字段必填。

RecurrenceSchedules.description: 策略执行周期列表。`StrategyType`（弹性模式）设为`NODE_SCALING_BY_SCHEDULE`（定时扩缩容）时，该字段必填。

RecurrenceType.description: 策略执行周期的类型。必须同时指定`RecurrenceType`和`RecurrenceValues`。

enumValueTitles.weekly: 周（每周指定几天重复执行一次定时任务）

RecurrenceValues.description: 策略执行周期的数值列表。

TimerPeriods.description:
策略执行周期的时间段列表。时间段设置要求：

- 最多可添加3个时间段。
- 时间段之间不重叠。
- 时间段之间的间隔大于或等于5分钟。
- 单个时间段的时长大于或等于15分钟。
- 所有时间段累计不跨天。

items.description: 策略执行周期的时间段。

ModifyNodePoolAttribute.title: ModifyNodePoolAttribute
ModifyNodePoolAttribute.summary: Changes the scaling policy of a delivery group. The following scaling policies are supported: fixed resource number, scheduled scaling, and auto scaling.

AuthorizeInstanceGroup.summary: Adds assigned users to or removes assigned users from a delivery group. Only users added to the assigned user list can access App Streaming.
AuthorizeInstanceGroup.title: AuthorizeInstanceGroup

LogOffAllSessionsInAppInstanceGroup.summary: Closes all sessions in a pay-as-you-go delivery group for which a scheduled scaling policy is used.
LogOffAllSessionsInAppInstanceGroup.title: LogOffAllSessionsInAppInstanceGroup

DeleteAppInstanceGroup.summary: Deletes a delivery group that uses the By Resource - Pay-as-you-go billing method.

400.errorMessage: The app instance group spec item is not found.
The browser instance group is not found.

DeleteAppInstanceGroup.title: DeleteAppInstanceGroup

ListAppInstances.summary: Queries the details of application instances in a delivery group, including the IDs, status, creation time, update time, session status, and public IP addresses associated with the primary NICs of the instances.
ListAppInstances.title: ListAppInstances

GetConnectionTicket.summary: Queries the credential that is used to connect to App Streaming.
GetConnectionTicket.title: GetConnectionTicket

Unbind.summary: Unbinds a user and a session.
Unbind.title: Unbind

ListBindInfo.summary: 查询绑定信息，支持分页

CreateImageFromAppInstanceGroup.summary: Creates a new image by debugging the delivery group.
CreateImageFromAppInstanceGroup.title: CreateImageFromAppInstanceGroup

GetDebugAppInstance.summary: Queries information that is used to debug an application instance.
GetDebugAppInstance.title: GetDebugAppInstance
